snippet: Sergio García was headed in the wrong direction, with no end in sight. But rather than give in to another frustrating weekend, García overcame some early hiccups and ended the third round of the Players Championship in contention.
abstract: Sergio García was headed in the wrong direction, with no end in sight. But rather than give in to another frustrating weekend, García overcame some early hiccups and ended the third round of the Players Championship in contention.

headline.main: García Rallies to Stay in Contention
